name: The Magwene Lab
body:
### Welcome 

This is the [Magwene Lab's](http://biology.duke.edu/magwenelab) GitHub Page.

### Links

 * [Magwene Lab Public Wiki](https://github.com/magwenelab/publicwiki/wiki)


### Affiliations

 * [Department of Biology](http://biology.duke.edu), Duke University
 * [Center for Systems](http://genome.duke.edu/centers/systems-biology/), Duke University
 * [Institute for Genome Sciences and Policy](http://genome.duke.edu/), Duke University
 * [Department of Molecular Genetics and Microbiology](http://mgm.duke.edu/), Duke University Medical Center
 * [Center for the Genomics of Microbial Systems](http://microbialgenomics.mgm.duke.edu/), Duke University Medical Center
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
